title: Kayne quest reset
body: Since patch this morning, the kayn quests have reset to zero. Had 5 and 4 with games played and now they have gone back to zero.

replies.body:
Hi Essembie, can you post a screenshot of your Kayn missions? I looked into your account and there still appears to be progress made on them.

EDIT: Wait, no, I see what you mean. The progress you have now is only what you made since you noticed the problem. I am asking around about this issue.

EDIT 2: If you lodge a ticket with support they may be able to assist you with this over the weekend, at the moment I can't perform a solution on this  for you myself.
Yeah i've got the same issue, except i've done the quests and got both icons.
Hi xSynx, I believe we are aware of this problem, and Player Support may be able to help you out. If you lodge a ticket with support they may be able to assist you with this over the weekend.
